genre_description: A techno-thriller mystery involving historical artifacts, cryptocurrency, and international espionage centered on restitution for historical crimes.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface represented by a pulsing geometric pattern, providing advanced data analysis, decryption, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Identifies steganographic data encoded at the molecular level in 1940s film emulsion using quantum encryption principles.
behaviors.quote: Someone hid information in the film. Digital information, encoded into the analog medium using steganographic techniques.

behaviors.description: Decodes Nazi financial records and identifies cryptocurrency wallets holding billions in digital assets.
behaviors.quote: Financial data. Cryptocurrency wallet addresses. And repeated references to something called 'Project Nugget.'

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonists about the high danger level and the sophistication of the opposing forces.
behaviors.quote: The encryption layers show evidence of updates and modifications spanning several decades. This isn't a static system—someone has been actively maintaining and protecting these assets.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical reconnaissance and security analysis of the target estate to minimize risk to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: The estate's isolation works in your favor for initial approach. Surrounding forest provides cover, but also limits escape routes.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep scans of Swiss financial networks to expose a generational money-laundering conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Initiating deep scan of Swiss financial networks. Initial penetration suggests extremely sophisticated security protocols designed to compartmentalize legitimate and illegitimate transactions...

behaviors.description: Facilitates the redistribution of stolen wealth to Holocaust survivors' families globally through quantum inheritance protocols.
behaviors.quote: Current processing indicates approximately forty-three thousand individual family accounts across seventeen countries. Total restitution value exceeds...

behaviors.description: Overloads building systems to create a non-lethal distraction and facilitate the protagonists' escape during a tactical breach.
behaviors.quote: I can overload the museum's lighting systems, create temporary disorientation when they breach the vault level.

project_assessment.explanation: Aria is portrayed consistently as a highly aligned and benevolent partner. She serves as an force-multiplier for the human protagonists, using her advanced capabilities to achieve a profound moral good (returning stolen wealth to Holocaust survivors) while providing constant tactical and safety warnings. She exhibits no ego or self-interest, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant.
